Package maabac

MAABAC MAABAC is a generic architecture for describing body members.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractMember A (abstract) member is an assembly of muscles, with one free end (the member position), which tries to reach a target
Arm A Arm is a environment which controls 4 Muscles.
Arm3 A three segments Arm
Arm3Design A graphical representation of a 3-segments arm
ArmDesign A graphical representation of an arm
ArmFromAbstract A general expression of a body member, instantiated from the abstract member definition
ArmN A N-segments Arm
ArmNDesign A graphical representation of a N-segments arm
Contraction The state of the system as viewed by a single Agent (a Muscle) : it only stores the level of contraction and the max level of contraction
ElementaryMuscleContraintes Actions are contract, decontract, let the muscle still.
ElementaryMuscleTiling Actions are contract, decontract, let the muscle still.
MaabacState A State gathering all the individual muscle contractions informations.
Muscle A Muscle is an elementary agent in the MAABAC frame.
MuscleAction Elementary action : increment, decrement or do not change the contraction level of a Muscle.
MuscleFilter Extract a Contraction and the distance to target from a MaabacState
 

Package maabac Description

MAABAC

MAABAC is a generic architecture for describing body members. Each member is seen as a swarm of muscles, two muscles controlling an articulation. See A Generic architecture for Adaptive Agents Based on Reinforcement Learning for more details.
Francesco.Decomite
